name: Slimebound
description:
Get the slimes to the flags, but be wary! Enemies move when the same color slime move! Can you safely solve each level while avoiding the crabs?

Designed for GMTK Game Jam 2021 with the theme of "Joined Together"

6/13/21 - known bug - in rare situations, enemy will sometimes hit slime directly in front of it in error

Credits

  • Design, Programming, Art, Sound Effects - Harrison Dunn
  • Music - Created by John Praw for this game, with performance by Corey Murphy, and samples from Luke Annear
  • Font - koltast on dafont.com

Made in Unity

Link to source on github
